name: 50% Chance REMAKE
description:
Do you think you're lucky enough to get to the end without dying? Put your luck into test!

I remade a game that I did last year but in Unreal Engine and in full 3D

Hope you enjoy it! 

You can take a Screenshot at the end of the levels and share it on twitter with the hashtag #50%chance to show your score

-I won't be updating it so this one is the final version-

(There's a little bug that when you go back to the main menu from any gamemode the volume and graphic settings go back to 0, sadly I wasn't able to fix it)
